scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd client && yarn && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn
scripts.dev-start: docker-compose up -d --build && docker ps && yarn dev-logs
scripts.dev-logs: docker logs -f --tail 30 talk-to-me-friend-client & docker logs -f --tail 30 talk-to-me-friend-server
scripts.delete-all: yarn delete-containers && yarn delete-images && yarn delete-volumes
scripts.delete-containers: docker container stop $(docker container ls -qa) && docker container rm $(docker container ls -qa)
